<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>CountOverdueNeedItTasksAssignedTo</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[//Construct a GlideRecord query to find all NeedIt Task Records with due date
//field values in the past for the same assigned to. The records cannot be in the closed state
var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
var OverdueNITasks = new GlideRecord('x_58872_needit_needit_task');
OverdueNITasks.addQuery('due_date','<=',rightnow);
OverdueNITasks.addQuery('state','<',3);
OverdueNITasks.addQuery('assigned_to',current.assigned_to);

OverdueNITasks.Query();
//Print to a message field on a notification
template.print("In addition to this overdue NeedIt Task, you have " + (OverdueNITasks.getrowcount() -1) + " more overdue NeedIt Tasks.");]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-27 21:19:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>d606c9ed2f4550105f7549e72799b638</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CountOverdueNeedItTasksAssignedTo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_d606c9ed2f4550105f7549e72799b638</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-27 21:24:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
